name: Barn Battles - Strategy Tactics Roguelite
description:
Battle your way through the barn in this turn-based tactics roguelite.  Catch the animals you want to join your team, or use their different abilities to outsmart your opponents! 

Prepare for BATTLE in the BARN!
  • Battle your way through 3 distinct zones with 3 unique bosses.
  • Move one unit at a time with turn-based tactics game-play on a minimalist chess-like board.
  • Capture and collect over a dozen    creatures to fight for you and take down your foes.
CONTROLS:
  • LMB - SELECT
  • RMB - DESELECT
  • MMB  +    1/2/3 - HOTKEY / CYCLE  abilities
  • TAB - CYCLE units
  • SPACE / RMB - END TURN
